alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lawrence, south central Cabell, northwestern Lincoln and central Wayne Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milo, or near Inez, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamlin, Ranger, East Lynn Lake, Kiahsville, Dunlow, Harts, West Hamlin, Crum, Clifford, Glenhayes, Branchland, Salt Rock, Palermo, East Lynn, Genoa and Myra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
